attributes.action: Make the 50+1 ownership model mandatory in English professional football
attributes.additional_details: Thanks to recent attempts to create a European Super League it is crucial that the history of English football which is embedded into the roots of many towns and cities is protected at all costs. The only way we can guarantee this will never happen again is if the fans are involved in the ownership of their own club.
attributes.background: The 50+1 ownership model needs to be introduced in English professional football to give the sport back to the fans.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583310

You may be interested to know that on 19 April the Government announced a 'Fan-led review of football governance', which will explore ways of improving the governance, ownership and financial sustainability of clubs in English football, building on the strengths of the football pyramid. You can read more about this review here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/fan-led-review-of-football-governance.
